Rule: Act out a scene from a movie. The other player guesses the movie. If correct, you smoke; if not, they smoke.
Answer a "Would you rather" question or smoke.
Flip a coin. Winner picks who smokes.
Hum a song of your choice. The other player guesses the song. If correct, you smoke; if not, they smoke.
Start a staring contest. Winner picks who smokes.
Play rock, paper, scissors. Winner picks who smokes.
Pick a superhero and act out this superhero without talking. The other player guesses. If correct, you smoke; if not, they smoke.
Pick an animal and act out this animal without talking. The other player guesses. If correct, you smoke; if not, they smoke.
Guess the colour of the other player's underwear. If correct, they smoke; if not, you smoke.
Play a game of thumb war. Winner picks who smokes.
Say the kinkiest thing you've done or smoke.
Do 13 pushups or take 2 smokes.
Show the other player the last five photos on your phone or smoke twice.
Tell a joke. If the other player laughs, they smoke; if no one laughs, you smoke twice.
The other player can ask you any question. You can either answer truthfully or refuse and smoke.
The other player can dare you to do anything. You can either fulfil the dare or refuse and smoke.
Without touching anything, both of you must balance on one leg. First to lose balance picks who smokes.
You must either take off an article of clothing or smoke.
Only speak with one or two-syllable words until someone messes up. That player smokes.
Ask the other player a true or false question about yourself. If they answer correctly, you smoke; if not, they smoke.
Guess what time it is without looking. Whoever is furthest off smokes.
Speak in third player until someone messes up. That player smokes.
Make any action, and the other player must repeat all previous actions and add another. Continue until someone messes up. That player smokes.
Pick a word. Take turns saying a word that relates to the previous word. The player that hesitates or says a non-related word smokes.
Pick a word. Take turns saying a word that rhymes with it. The player that hesitates or repeats a word smokes.
Guess the colour of the other player's underwear. If correct, they smoke; if not, you smoke.
Starting with you, take turns naming a colour. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a colour. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming a country. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a country. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming a fruit. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a fruit. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming a land animal. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a land animal. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming a spice. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a spice. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming an insect. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats an insect. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming an ocean animal. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats an ocean animal. That player smokes.
Tell two truths and a lie. The other player can guess. If correct, you smoke; if wrong, they smoke.
Waterfall! Start smokeing and the other player must smoke as long as you do.
After this card is read, both players must play in silence until it’s your turn again. The first player to laugh or talk smokes and ends the silence.
Keep your eyes closed until it’s your turn again. If you open your eyes, you smoke.
Make a rule for the other player to follow until it’s your turn again. If they break the rule, they smoke.
The player farthest from you makes a rule for you to follow until it’s your turn again. If you break the rule, you smoke.
Make a rule that both players have to follow until it’s your turn again. If either player breaks the rule, they smoke.
Talk with an accent until your next turn. If caught not speaking in the accent, you smoke.
Whoever drank in the last round picks two people to smoke (they can pick the same player twice).
You cannot laugh until it’s your turn again. If you do, you smoke.
You cannot make eye contact with anyone until it’s your turn again. If you do, you smoke.
